page.title: 10TEXT ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: The accounts presented for the Bradnop area have been researched and written by members of the 3rd. year of Leek High School. They are a result of numerous visits to the Bradnop area between May and July 1985. It has been my pleasure to coordinate and lead the team in what has been a rewarding and enjoyable experience. The team has comprised of: Joanne Iwanicki,Joanne Nicholls, Neil Harrison, Stephen Robinson,David Ferns, Jonathan Taylor, Peter Tomlinson, Mark Hughes. Team leader: Matthew T. Percival.
